}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== DHUA-W8 is an 802.11 ac/a/b/g/n dual band 2x2 wifi and Bluetooth combo USB module designed for devices which require high throughput and lower-power consumption. It’s a highly integrated module that supports 2-stream 802.11ac/a/b/g/n MIMO technology with data rate from MCS 0-15 in 20MHz/40MHz/80MHz channels, and Bluetooth 4.1 LE.
*"48DHUA04.0GA" is silkscreened on the W8 board (12-pin). *"48DHUA20.SGB" is silkscreened on the W8S board (14-pad). {{see also|Unex|Wistron NeWeb}}
==Links of Interest== :[https://unex.com.tw/products/wi-fi/chipset/qualcomm/qca9378/detail/dhua-w8 Product page] (W8) {{•}} [https://unex.com.tw/products/wi-fi/chipset/qualcomm/qca9378/detail/dhua-w8s Product page] (W8S) :[https://www.unex.com.tw/download/5837aee107191/60 Datasheet] (W8)
